en.text: As an official 29k host you can register here to be able to create public sessions.
en.needToUpgrade: To become an official host you need to register an account.
en.requestComplete:
We've now registered your request.

As soon as it's approved we'll email you a verification code.
en.success__markdown:
*Success!*
You're now able to create and host sessions open for every 29k user to join!
